segments.text: I see the sunlight streaming through the open window, illuminating the kitchen with a soft glow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so inviting and calm compared to the mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s hard not to smile at the sight of the children so eager to get their hands on cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I notice the boy’s stool is wobbling dangerously underneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can the woman not see the laughter and danger unfolding right behind her?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang of worry as I watch him reach deeper into the jar, stretching just a bit too far.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s arm is reaching up, and I can see her excitement mixed with impatience.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m taken aback by the sheer innocence of it all; children don’t know the risks they’re taking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems like she belongs in another world, focused and unaware of the bubbling chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: In this ordinary day, anything can tip over and change everything in a split second.
segments.speaker: PAR
